8.title: The Door to the BLEH opens and lets out steaam

9.title: Ada jumps up to deal with the steam then sits back down

parts.text: [This is really difficult. I think I need a break]
[I just need to sit down for a minute]
[Ah this is lovely, but we still need to find that book]
[I couldn't figure out where the book was]
"Honestly, Ada, I think a title may be more useful."
"X is for horizontal, which means sideways, and Y is for vertical, which means up and down."
"Book. Rectangular thing with pages. They say different things inside them and this one says things other than the things I need it to say. Keep looking."
"I can only imagine these are coordinates of some kind."

"Hmm. Try counting along from left to right.
